p: Natural products and their derivatives have been commonly used in our daily life, as they play important roles in boosting immune systems and fighting diseases. However, novel bioactive compounds are continuously in demand due to a rise of antibiotic resistance, cancer and infectious outbreaks, including recent pandemics (e.g., COVID-19). To contribute to that quest, this Special Issue showcases 13 papers, highlighting recent advances in the isolation and characterization of natural products and their derivatives with antibacterial, antioxidant and anticancer properties.
